sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_W1.query
sqlquery.select: select '100' as value from dual

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_W2.query
sqlquery.select: select '100' as value from dual

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_W3.query
SQL_IND_GROUP1.query
sqlquery.select: select * from (select a.exploration_time,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.statistical_time DESC) from dw_group_eoms_handle1 a left join (SELECT * FROM BS_T_SM_DICITEM WHERE DTID = '201908220000003') b on a.city = b.divalue WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$) where ROWNUM=1

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_GROUP1_MON.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT * FROM ( select TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -ROWNUM+1), 'mm'),'yyyy-mm') as mons FROM dual CONNECT by ROWNUM<=12 ) d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT exploration_time AS VALUE , SUBSTR(statistical_time,0,7) AS MON FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SUBSTR(statistical_time,0,7) ORDER BY statistical_time DESC) rn, a.* FROM dw_group_eoms_handle1 a left join (SELECT * FROM BS_T_SM_DICITEM WHERE DTID = '201908220000003') b on a.city = b.divalue WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$ ) WHERE rn = 1 ) a ON d.mons=a.mon ORDER BY d.MONS desc

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_GROUP2.query
sqlquery.select: select * from (select a.enforceable_time,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a.statistical_time DESC) from dw_group_eoms_handle1 a left join (SELECT * FROM BS_T_SM_DICITEM WHERE DTID = '201908220000003') b on a.city = b.divalue WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$) where ROWNUM=1

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_GROUP2_MON.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT * FROM ( select TO_CHAR(TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -ROWNUM+1), 'mm'),'yyyy-mm') as mons FROM dual CONNECT by ROWNUM<=12 ) d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT enforceable_time AS VALUE , SUBSTR(statistical_time,0,7) AS MON FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SUBSTR(statistical_time,0,7) ORDER BY statistical_time DESC) rn, a.* FROM dw_group_eoms_handle1 a left join (SELECT * FROM BS_T_SM_DICITEM WHERE DTID = '201908220000003') b on a.city = b.divalue WHERE 1 = 1 $customwhere$ ) WHERE rn = 1 ) a ON d.mons=a.mon ORDER BY d.MONS desc

sqlquery.name: SQL_IND_GROUP3_PIE.query
sqlquery.select: SELECT DINAME AS CITY ,disposable_time AS VALUE FROM (SELECT a.* ,b.*,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY DINAME ORDER BY a.statistical_time DESC) rn FROM dw_group_eoms_handle1 a left join (SELECT * FROM BS_T_SM_DICITEM WHERE DTID = '201908220000003' ) b on a.city = b.divalue WHERE 1=1 $customwhere$ ) WHERE rn = 1 GROUP BY DINAME , disposable_time ORDER BY value desc
